name: nearby_superchargers
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool nearby_tesla_superchargers.
Tool description: Find nearby Tesla Superchargers. Global.
API description: Fetches nearby Tesla superchargers within a specified radius around given coordinates.

lng.description: Longitude of the center point to search for superchargers.

lat.description: Latitude of the center point to search for superchargers.

radius.description: Radius in kilometers to search within, default is 20 km.
